cl.shazkho.utils.keitaijisho.tools

Class JapaneseWritingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cl.shazkho.utils.keitaijisho.tools.JapaneseWritingHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StaticHelpers

    public class JapaneseWritingHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements StaticHelpers
    ************************************* PROJECT: KEITAI JISHO MODULE: JapaneseWritingHelper Package: cl.shazkho.utils.keitaijisho.tools *************************************** Helper class to hel manage japanese writing systems. *************************************** IMPORTANT AUTHOR INFORMATION!! Some of the functions implemented on the current script ARE NOT MY OWN WORK. In particular, methods 'toRoma', 'katakanaToHiragana' and 'prepareJtoR' are part of the project WANA KANA JAVA, MIT Licensed by Matthew Miller on 2013.
    Version:
    0.7 - March 09, 2015
    Author:
    Matthew Miller, George Shazkho

        Returns:

      • isSomething

        public static java.lang.String isSomething(java.lang.String test)
        Determines if a String is of any of the accepted Japanese Writing Systems.
        Parameters:
        test - The String to be tested.
        Returns:
        An String corresponding to the writing system found. "mixed" if not valid.
